# Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actress in an Action Movie

(2)
| year = 2021
| website = http://www.criticschoice.com/
}}
The '''Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actress in an Action Movie' is an award presented by the Critics Choice Association to the best performance by an actress in an action film.
This award was first presented in 2021 to Betty Gilpin for her role as Crystal Creasey on The Hunt. The most nominated actresses in this category are Ana de Armas and Joey King, with two nominations each.
The current recipient of the award is June Squibb for her role as Thelma in Thelma.
